00034 #include "debug.hpp"

00036 namespace ting{
00037 
00041 typedef unsigned char u8;
00042 
00046 typedef signed char s8;
00047 
00051 typedef unsigned short int u16;
00052 
00056 typedef signed short int s16;
00057 
00061 typedef unsigned int u32;
00062 
00066 typedef signed int s32;
00067 
00071 typedef unsigned long long int u64;
00072 
00076 typedef long long int s64;
00077 
00078 
00079 #ifndef M_DOC_DONT_EXTRACT //for doxygen
00080 
00081 STATIC_ASSERT(u8(-1) == 0xff)//assert that byte consists of exactly 8 bits, e.g. some systems have 10 bits per byte!!!
00082 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(u8) == 1)
00083 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(s8) == 1)
00084 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(u16) == 2)
00085 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(s16) == 2)
00086 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(u32) == 4)
00087 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(s32) == 4)
00088 STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(u64) == 8)
00089 STATIC_ASSERT(u64(-1) == 0xffffffffffffffffLL)
00090 
00091 #endif //~M_DOC_DONT_EXTRACT //for doxygen
00092 
00093 }//~namespace ting
